Q: If it is known that a person is male, what is the probability that they are a pilot?
A: 80% of people are men, 30% of men are pilots. Therefore 24% of people are men and pilots.
```Probability of someone being a pilot | Probability of someone being male  ---|---  24% | 80% (pilot) * (male) = 24% ```
